doc:
Ian Hart https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ian_Hart 0 Ian Hart (born Ian Davies; 8 October 1964) is an English stage, television and film actor best known for playing Quirinus Quirrell in the 2001 fantasy film Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, as well as portraying Joe O'Reilly in Michael Collins. Ian_Hart ( born Ian_Davies ; 8_October_1964 ) is an_English_stage_,_television_and_film_actor best_known for playing Quirinus_Quirrell in the_2001_fantasy_film_Harry_Potter and the_Philosopher 's_Stone , as_well_as portraying Joe_O'Reilly in Michael_Collins .
